text: Wait... if `MyModule.jl` just has a module in it and then I run `julia MyModule.jl` it initializes the module?

elements.text: just has a module in it and then I run

text:
Woah, ok. I dig it. I'm never writing a script again!
```julia> module InlineModule
           function __init__()
               println("Hello World from a module init!")
           end
       end
Hello World from a module init!
Main.InlineModule```
